page.title: 04BROOK METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: This was constructed in 1848 by the local community of that time.The {Reverend Virginia Ramsey}holds the service on the first Sunday of every month. The church is built of stone and measures 10 metres long and 6 metres wide.The locals who attend the monthly service say they thoroughly enjoy the opportunity for the{community to get {together}and, all those who were interviewed expressed how much they thoroughly enjoy the{friendly {atmosphere,}and the way in which the Reverend Ramsey conducts the service. Brook Methodist church is one of two churches in Brook, the other being St.Mary's parish church.
